channel.title: CVE Feed for PBN Hosting SL -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PBN Hosting SL -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37219|2024-08-02T03:50:55.240Z -- pbn%20hosting%20sl -- page%20builder%20sandwich%20%E2%80%93%20front-end%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PBN Hosting SL Page Builder Sandwich – Front-End Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Page Builder Sandwich – Front-End Page Builder: from n/a through 5.1.0.
